metadata.creator: Krinkles
metadata.description:
Experience the original flash version of Madness Combat: Project Nexus

WARNING: The game may try to send you to newgrounds when loads up, to avoid this when you load up the swf, turn off the internet connection on your computer. Afterwards when the game boots up you'll just have to press the launch button and play!
metadata.subject: Newground;Flash;Flash Games;Madness;Madness Combat;Madness: Project Nexus
metadata.title: Madness: Project Nexus Classic
